title: Eternal Necklace by Eternal Rose - 24k Gold Dipped Rose Necklace for Women - Real Rose Pendant Necklace - Gold Ladies Evening Jewelry - Gift for Her - Ideal for Weddings, Marriage Ceremonies, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Parties, Special Occasions, Homecomings, Graduations
description: Elegant, personal and meaningful, our Eternal Necklace by Eternal Rose collection is perfect for showing that special person just how much they mean to you, as well as adding sparkle to your own look. Each necklace features a real rose pendant dipped in 24k gold and stylised in exclusive colors or shades only available from Eternal Rose. Perfect on its own or as part of a themed Eternal Rose set. Eternal Rose is the gold standard in one-of-a-kind 24k gold rose jewelry and gift items. We are proud to be unmatched in the quality and presentation of our products. Each and every Eternal Rose piece is a hand-picked fresh rose that is handcrafted through a 65-step process into a stunning jewelry item. It is then dipped into 24k gold and preserved to last for eternity. As nature intended, no two roses in our collection are ever the same, however they all share the same glossy lacquer finish and are presented in our signature velvet presentation box. Made in the USA. Carefully packaged to arrive at your door in pristine condition. Includes a 14-day warranty in the unlikely case you are unsatisfied with your order.

The only thing I'm concerned about is the longevity of the necklace. Since this isn't a Kmart special, I'm hoping the rose gold doesn't wear off very quickly, or at all for that matter! Time will tell and hopefully I'm not adjusting my review in a few months!
Other than longevity, I have no concerns or complaints about this necklace.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Package and What a Sparkle
reviews.review:
The necklace was well packaged so that it would not flop around during shipping. Not all companies take this extra step, sometimes leading to knots in the chain. Not so with this thing!

The light catches the birthstones quiet well and they just sparkle. The charm, with the stone in the center, is appropriately portioned and it presents very well. My only complaint - why it is listed as a 4 instead of a 5 - is the chain. It is not the most sturdy in the world but I do appreciate the clasp they attached to it.

Not a bad little birthstone set for you.

reviews.review: This necklace will be an extra birthday present for my wife. I don't know much about jewelry, but I know enough to know that it looks really good! I got the April birthstone (not her birthstone) because her month wasn't available and I'm so glad I did. Looks like a real diamond to me. Nowhere in the seller's description or on the box does it say what the stone is. I'm guessing topaz? It's somewhat smaller than I imagined, but she doesn't like large jewelry anyway. I've looked at it with a magnifying glass and the cut is neat. No shoddy worksmanship at all. It's packaged elegantly and I'm certain she'll like it.
